title: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture
description: Define the overall structure and components of the autonomous repair robot.

title: Develop the Detection System
description: Create a system for the robot to accurately identify damaged infrastructure.
dependencies: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture

title: Implement Autonomous Navigation for the Robot
description: Develop a navigation system that allows the robot to traverse various terrains autonomously.
dependencies: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture

title: Create a Robust Damage Assessment Algorithm
description: Develop an algorithm for the robot to assess the severity of damage to infrastructure.
dependencies: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture

title: Design and Develop the Repair Mechanism
description: Design and implement a repair mechanism for the robot to fix damaged infrastructure.
dependencies: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture

title: Create User Interface for Monitoring and Control
description: Develop a user interface for operators to monitor and control the robots.
dependencies: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture

title: Perform Security Audit of the System
description: Identify and address any potential security vulnerabilities in the system.
dependencies: Design the Autonomous Repair Robot Architecture
